predicate.note: Frames file for 'divvy up' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry.

example.name: active, all args
example.text: A previously available program called Network Computing System, developed by Hewlett-Packard's Apollo division, for instance, takes a task and splits it up into parts, [*-1] divvying up those parts to several computers in a network for simultaneous processing.
example.arg: [*-1] -> A previously available program called Network Computing System, developed by Hewlett-Packard's Apollo division

example.name: passive
example.text: The amount of income divvied [*] up for each man, woman and child was $16,489 in 1988, up 6.6% from $15,472 in 1987.
